sentences: Minu keha on väga heas seisundis.
Ta tõi oma keha ja hinge kõikjale kaasa.
context: The word 'keha' in Estonian means body. It refers to the physical form or structure of a person, animal, or object. In Estonian grammar, 'keha' is a neuter noun that can be used in different cases depending on its function in a sentence.
